name: Verify Ladagocia Planet Blocks Interaction Until Report Complete
description: Validates that Ladagocia planet displays blocking message until Cerebellum report is completed.
testObjective: Ensure game progression gate functions correctly for planet interactions.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has not completed Cerebellum report

steps.action: Locate Ladagocia planet in camera view
steps.expected: Ladagocia planet is visible in the camera

steps.action: Click [E] or [LMB] to interact with Ladagocia
steps.expected: System displays message: 'REPORT ON PLANET BEFORE CONTINUING'
Same blocking message appears, preventing course setting

postconditions: Ladagocia interaction is blocked until prerequisites met
Player understands they must complete a report first
